mew I removed the non-ultimate versions to slim down the install.wim.  There's no reason to include them if I don't upgrade them.

yutian you can use the link I provided and get windows loader from daz. It's probably the best windows activation hacktool of all time.

You don't NEED a key to install, there's a skip button. You CAN enter one if you have a legit key sitting around for ultimate.

If you don't have a legit key I recommend getting windows loader.  You can use removewat, but it will stop you from being able to upgrade to sp2 when it comes out.

lmv you should be fine to install lang packs. Just run windows update and select the desired one from the optional tab. Then go into control panel and navigate to languages.

I burned the iso on a DVD and booted from to to install. But the moment of install process when it says "Expanding Files..." it showed me an error saying that some files are missing and the setup failed.

Then I booted to previous windows and extracted it and installed it from desktop, it worked!

I am thankful to you @murphy78 for giving such an updated version of Windows 7, but it has one mentioned problem.

But still accept my thanks and happy new year.
